email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We are pleased to offer mv SEA HORIZON for your 8500MT steel coils shipment from Rotterdam to Houston.
Rate: USD 78/MT CFR basis.
Laycan: 20-25 October 2023.
NYPE terms with demurrage USD 12,000/day.

Kind regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. USD 78/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Can you revise to USD 72/MT?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We can adjust the rate to USD 75/MT. Owners are keen to secure this cargo and are willing to offer this revised rate.

Kind regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Laura,

USD 75/MT is still above our target. We are seeing offers around USD 70/MT. Can you match this rate?

Regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

After further discussions with the owners, we can offer a final rate of USD 72/MT. This is our best and final offer.

Kind regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Laura,

We accept your final offer of USD 72/MT. Please send the recap.

Best regards,
John Doe
